content: SIW 6AT-22 Mid-Torque impact wrench Power-class 22V impact wrench with robust 1/2 friction ring anvil for faster and safer anchoring and bolting ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Impact drivers and wrenches- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster concrete screw anchor setting from a more compact tool, thanks to the combination of brushless motor and next-generation Nuron batteries More durable build – the brushless motor and friction ring anvil contribute to the longevity of our cordless impact wrenches Applications Setting HUS screw anchors in concrete for baseplates, formwork props, handrails and temporary fixtures (3/8”-5/8” diameter) Setting Hilti stud anchors in concrete with Adaptive Torque module (1/2-3/4” diameter) Lag bolting in wood for primary and secondary wood structures, wood roofs, or temporary structures (3/8”-5/8” diameter) Setting Hilti MT installation system more quickly and safely with Adaptive Torque module ### TECHNICAL DATA: Anvil type: 1/2 friction ring Maximum torque: 221 ft-lbs (1); 332 ft-lbs (2) Nut busting torque: 479 ft-lbs Technical Data | Anvil type | 1/2 friction ring | Maximum torque | 221 ft-lbs (1); 332 ft-lbs (2) | 1 | Nut busting torque | 479 ft-lbs | Full hammering frequency | 3500 impacts/minute | Number of gears | 2 | No load RPM | gear 1: 1550 rpm; gear 2: 1750 rpm | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 7.2 x 2.8 x 8.7 in | Tool body weight | 4 lb | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 100 dB (A) | 2 | Rated voltage | 21.6 V | Do not use the tool for applications where an exact torque or maximum torque is specified - there is a risk of over-tightening and damaging the screw or workpiece. | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 2365072 - Cordl. impact wrench SIW 6AT-22 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SIW 6AT-22 03 Cordl. imp. wrench
